svg.title: Present weather reported from a manned weather station: Shower(s) of hail,*** or of rain and hail***. *** Hail, small hail, snow pellets. French: grêle, grésil ou neige roulée
svg.desc: WMO international weather symbol: Precipitation, fog, ice fog or thunderstorm at the station during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation: Present weather reported from a manned weather station: Shower(s) of hail,*** or of rain and hail***. *** Hail, small hail, snow pellets. French: grêle, grésil ou neige roulée
